Query Account Details and Balance

Source: R/near_query_account.R
near_query_account.Rd

Retrieves full account state including balance, storage usage, and code hash.

Usage

near_query_account(account_id, finality = "final", block_id = NULL)

Arguments

account_id

Character scalar. Account to query.

finality

"final" (default) or "optimistic".

block_id

Optional block height or hash.

Value

A tibble with account details (amount in yoctoNEAR, etc.).

See also

https://docs.near.org/api/rpc/contracts#view-account

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
near_set_endpoint("mainnet")
near_query_account("vitalik.near")
near_query_account("near")
} # }
